story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Alathasiba started in 2025 as an initiative to provide a comprehensive set of calculators and converters in Arabic. We noticed a lack of Arabic websites providing integrated calculation solutions and wanted to bridge this gap.
story.p2: Since its launch, the site has evolved to include dozens of specialized calculators in the fields of mathematics, engineering, finance, conversions, and health. We are constantly striving to expand our range of tools to meet the diverse needs of our users.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.intro: We believe that technology should be accessible to everyone, regardless of educational background or language. Our mission is to:
list: Provide accurate and easy-to-use calculators in Arabic and English
Help students and professionals complete their tasks quickly and efficiently
Simplify complex calculations through easy-to-understand user interfaces
Provide high-quality free services to users worldwide

privacy.title: Privacy Policy | Alathasiba
privacy.metaDescription: Privacy policy and data protection at Alathasiba.
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy

intro.title: Introduction
intro.p1: We at Alathasiba value your privacy. This privacy policy describes our approach to privacy and data handling when you use our site. Our calculators work entirely in your browser and do not send your calculation data to our servers.
intro.p2: Please read this privacy policy carefully to understand our practices. All calculator computations are performed locally on your device, ensuring your data privacy and security.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.intro: We may collect different types of information, including:

personal.title: Personally Identifiable Information
personal.intro: We do not collect or store any personally identifiable information. All calculator operations are performed locally in your browser. We do not have contact forms or user accounts.

nonPersonal.title: Analytics Information
nonPersonal.intro: We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use our site. This service may collect anonymous information such as:
list: Browser type and version
Operating system
Pages visited and time spent
Referring website
Geographic region (country/city level only)
nonPersonal.note: This data is collected by Google Analytics and is not stored on our servers. All calculator inputs and results remain private on your device.

usage.title: How We Use Information
usage.intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

list.text: We constantly strive to improve our site content and offerings based on the information and feedback we receive from you.
The information you provide helps us respond more effectively to customer service requests and support needs.
We may use the email address you provide to respond to your inquiries or comments.
We may use information, in aggregate, to understand how users use our services and resources provided on our site.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.p1: Our site uses 'cookies' to enhance user experience, analyze trends, and manage the site. Cookies are small text files placed on your computer by a web page server. They are stored on your device's hard drive.
cookies.p2: You can choose to set your browser to refuse cookies, or to alert you when cookies are sent. If you do so, note that some parts of the site may not function properly.

list.text: These are temporary files that stay on your device until you leave our site.
These remain on your device for a specified period or until you delete them manually.
We use services like Google Analytics to understand how users interact with our site.

ads.title: Advertising
ads.p1: Our site may use third-party advertising networks, such as Google AdSense, to show ads. These networks use cookies to show suitable ads to you based on your interests and internet use.
ads.p2: You can choose not to use Google's cookies by visiting the Google Ad Settings page. Alternatively, you can choose not to use cookies by other advertising providers by visiting the Network Advertising Initiative site.

security.title: Information Security
security.p1: We follow appropriate security practices and procedures to protect your personal data from loss, misuse, modification, unauthorized disclosure, or unauthorized access. However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.
security.p2: While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

links.title: Links to Other Websites
links.p1: Our site may contain links to other sites. Please note that we are not responsible for the privacy practices of other sites. We encourage you to read the privacy statements of each site you visit that collects personally identifiable information.
links.p2: This privacy policy applies only to information collected through our site.

list: Right to access your personal data
Right to correct your personal data
Right to delete your personal data
Right to restrict processing of your personal data
Right to data portability
Right to object to processing of your personal data
rights.p1: If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.
